title: 1 Alabama cheeseburger makes the list of the 25 best in America
text:
Comments 
The accolades keep on coming for the Hamburger Fonfon at Frank and Pardis Stitt's Birmingham bistro Chez Fonfon. 
The food and dining website The Daily Meal has ranked the Chez Fonfon burger No. 16 on it most recent list of the 25 Best Cheeseburgers in America. 
Earlier this year, the Hamburger Fonfon also was No. 37 on The Daily Meal's 2015 edition of the 101 Best Burgers in America . 
Previously,the food and travel website Thrillist selected it as Alabama's entry on its list of The Best Burger in Every State in America , as did Business Insider . 
Also, in 2011, the Hamburger Fonfon was chosen Birmingham's Best Burger by The Birmingham News, and in 2014, it was one of 15 finalists in AL.com's statewide Alabama's Best Cheeseburger contest. 
What makes the Hamburger Fonfon so special? 
"We use all-natural ground chuck shoulder that we grind here in house," Chez Fonfon chef de cuisine Adam Grusin told AL.com's David Holloway. "We get it shipped in from Colorado, and it is hormone-free." 
The meat is cooked over an open-flame grill, and Grusin recommends that diners order it cooked to medium or medium-rare. It is topped with a slice of Comte cheese and dressed with a grilled red onion and a leaf of Romaine and served on a brioche bun that is baked in-house daily. It is served with Chef Fonfon's house-made djionnaise sauce and cornichons on the side. 
To read what The Daily Meal had to say about the Hamburger Fonfon -- and to see the entire list of the 25 Best Cheeseburgers in America -- go here. 
Chez Fonfon is at 2007 11th Ave. South in Birmingham. The phone number is 205-939-32221, and the website is www.fonfonbham.com . 
Hours are 11 a.m. to 10 p.m. Tuesdays through Thursdays, 11 a.m. to 10:30 p.m. Fridays and 4:30 to 10:30 p.m. Saturdays.
